No other class objects are considered primitive. + * + * @apiNote + * A {@code Class} object represented a primitive type can be + * accessed via the {@code TYPE} public static final variables + * defined in the primitive wrapper classes such as {@link + * java.lang.Integer#TYPE Integer.TYPE}.
